api.methods.frequency_band.name: Frequency Band Analysis
api.methods.frequency_band.desc: Decomposes image into multiple frequency sub-bands using filter banks. AI-generated images show anomalous energy distribution across bands due to upsampling artifacts.
api.methods.face_landmark.name: Face Landmark Consistency
api.methods.face_landmark.desc: Detects inconsistencies in facial landmark positions using 68-point face mesh. AI-generated faces often have subtle geometric anomalies.
api.methods.lighting.name: Illumination Consistency Analysis
api.methods.lighting.desc: Estimates light source direction and consistency across image regions. AI images often have physically impossible lighting configurations.
api.methods.shadow.name: Shadow Consistency Analysis
api.methods.shadow.desc: Analyzes shadow geometry, direction, and softness for physical plausibility. AI models struggle to maintain consistent shadow casting.
api.methods.perspective.name: Perspective Geometry Analysis
api.methods.perspective.desc: Checks geometric consistency of parallel lines, vanishing points, and depth cues. AI-generated scenes often contain perspective distortions.
api.methods.reflection.name: Reflection Consistency Analysis
api.methods.reflection.desc: Examines reflections in eyes, glasses, and surfaces for physical accuracy. AI models frequently generate physically impossible reflections.
api.methods.double_jpeg.name: Double JPEG Compression Detection
api.methods.double_jpeg.desc: Detects traces of double JPEG compression by analyzing DCT coefficient histograms. Tampering often involves re-saving, creating detectable periodic patterns.
api.methods.patchforensics.name: Patch-based Forensics (CNN)
api.methods.patchforensics.desc: Uses CNN classifiers on small image patches to detect local manipulations. Each patch is independently classified, creating a manipulation probability map.
api.methods.clip_detection.name: CLIP-based AI Detection
api.methods.clip_detection.desc: Leverages OpenAI CLIP vision-language model to detect semantic inconsistencies. Uses contrastive learning for zero-shot AI content detection.
api.methods.binary_pattern.name: Local Binary Pattern (LBP) Analysis
api.methods.binary_pattern.desc: Extracts micro-texture descriptors using LBP operators. AI-generated images produce distinct LBP histogram distributions compared to natural photographs.
api.methods.fourier_ring.name: Fourier Ring Pattern Detection
api.methods.fourier_ring.desc: Detects periodic ring patterns in 2D Fourier spectrum caused by GAN upsampling operations. These spectral anomalies are invisible to human eyes.
api.methods.resnet_classifier.name: ResNet Binary Classifier
api.methods.resnet_classifier.desc: Fine-tuned ResNet-50 deep neural network trained on large-scale real vs. AI-generated image datasets using transfer learning from ImageNet.
api.methods.vit_detection.name: Vision Transformer (ViT) Detection
api.methods.vit_detection.desc: Uses Vision Transformer architecture to capture long-range dependencies in images. ViT excels at detecting subtle global patterns that CNNs may miss.
api.methods.gram_matrix.name: Gram Matrix Texture Analysis
api.methods.gram_matrix.desc: Computes Gram matrix from CNN feature maps to capture style and texture correlations. AI images produce distinctive patterns different from natural photos.
api.methods.srm_filter.name: SRM Filter Analysis
api.methods.srm_filter.desc: Applies Spatial Rich Model (SRM) high-pass filters to extract noise residuals. 30 hand-crafted filters effectively detect AI generation artifacts.
